alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 9:53PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Carson, southeastern Hutchinson, northwestern Gray and southwestern Roberts Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 953 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Borger to 7 miles southwest of Skellytown to Panhandle. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Borger, Panhandle, White Deer, Groom, Skellytown and Kingsmill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
